campaign.title: Featured Listing Upgrade
campaign.subject: Your listing could be getting 5x more views
campaign.description: Compare current views to featured average, offer upgrade

slides.title: Your Visibility Gap
slides.narration: Let's look at the numbers for {{business_name}}. Your current monthly views: {{current_monthly_views}}. Featured listings in your category average {{featured_average_views}} views. That's a {{visibility_multiplier}}x difference. Here's how to close that gap.

slides.title: What Featured Gets You

benefits.detail: Top of search results and category

slides.narration: What does Featured get you? Priority placement—top of search results and your category. A Featured badge—an instant trust signal. News eligibility—you're considered for feature stories. Enhanced analytics—see who's viewing and why. Social amplification—promoted to our entire audience. And AI priority—weighted higher when AI makes recommendations.

slides.title: Featured Results
slides.narration: The results speak for themselves. Featured businesses see an average four hundred eighty-seven percent increase in views—three to eight times typical. Inquiries increase by three hundred twelve percent on average. AI recommendations increase by five times. And the ROI? Twelve to one on average. For every dollar spent on Featured, businesses see twelve back.

slides.title: Your Featured Preview
slides.narration: Here's how {{business_name}} would appear as a Featured listing. Your name with the Featured badge. Top position in {{category}} results. Enhanced profile with all the bells and whistles. Priority in AI recommendations. This preview is ready to activate whenever you say go.

slides.title: Simple Pricing

content.headline: Featured Pricing
content.includes: All Featured benefits included in both plans

slides.narration: Pricing is simple. Monthly: {{monthly_price}} dollars per month, cancel anytime. Or go annual at {{annual_price}} per month and save {{annual_savings}} percent. Both plans include all Featured benefits. And there's a thirty-day satisfaction guarantee—if you don't see results, we'll make it right.

slides.title: Featured Success Story

content.quote: Featured paid for itself in the first week. I was skeptical, but the numbers don't lie—I'm getting calls I never got before.
content.author: {{testimonial_name}}

slides.narration: Don't just take our word for it. {{testimonial_name}} from {{testimonial_business}} said: 'Featured paid for itself in the first week. I was skeptical, but the numbers don't lie—I'm getting calls I never got before.' They saw {{testimonial_result}} after upgrading.

slides.title: Upgrade to Featured
slides.narration: Ready for {{visibility_multiplier}}x more visibility? Click 'Upgrade to Featured' to activate now. Or compare all plans if you want to see other options. Featured spots in {{category}} are limited—don't let competitors take yours. Remember: thirty-day satisfaction guarantee. No risk, all upside.

email_hook.subject: Your listing could be getting 5x more views
email_hook.body:
Hey {{first_name}},

I looked at {{business_name}}'s listing performance.

Your monthly views: {{current_monthly_views}}
Featured average in {{category}}: {{featured_average_views}}

That's a {{visibility_multiplier}}x gap.

Featured businesses see:
• +487% more views

• 12:1 average ROI

[SEE YOUR FEATURED PREVIEW →]

Your Featured listing is ready to activate. The gap is closable.
